meanings.sent1: His bloodshot eyes showed he had not slept well.
meanings.sent2: Her bloodshot eyes were a clear sign of fatigue.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked surprised at the bloodshot eyes staring back at it.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with bloodshot hues, a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The horror movie left an image of bloodshot eyes burned into her memory.

meanings.sent1: The bloodshot sky at dawn promised a hot day ahead.
meanings.sent2: The old painting had bloodshot marks from years of exposure.
meanings.sent3: The spilled juice left a bloodshot trail on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The map was covered in bloodshot lines, marking the treacherous journey.
meanings.sent5: The flower petals had a bloodshot pattern, adding beauty to the garden.
